mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TOP (${from}+${size}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ID ASC) AS rowid,
from T_airport_employee p
or p.CODE like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.NAME like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.CORPATION like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.DEPARTMENT like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.STATION like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.STATUS like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.FINGERPRINT like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.LOGINUSR like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.LOGINPWD like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.RIGHTLEVEL like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.REMARK like '%${condition.CODE}%'
order by ${sort} ${order} ) AS t WHERE rowid > ${from}

select count(*) count from T_airport_employee p
or p.CODE like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.NAME like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.CORPATION like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.DEPARTMENT like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.STATION like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.STATUS like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.FINGERPRINT like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.LOGINUSR like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.LOGINPWD like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.RIGHTLEVEL like '%${condition.CODE}%' or p.REMARK like '%${condition.CODE}%'

select
from T_airport_employee order by ID
mapper.insert: insert into T_airport_employee (CODE, NAME,CORPATION,DEPARTMENT,STATION ,STATUS,FINGERPRINT,LOGINUSR,LOGINPWD,RIGHTLEVEL, REMARK, BY1,BY2,BY3,BY4,BY5,BY6,BY7,BY8,BY9,BY10) values ( #{CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CORPATION,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DEPARTMENT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{STATION,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FINGERPRINT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOGINUSR,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LOGINPWD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RIGHTLEVEL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REMARK,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BY1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BY2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BY3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BY4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BY5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BY6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BY7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BY8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BY9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BY10,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update T_airport_employee
CODE = #{CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CORPATION = #{CORPATION,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTMENT = #{DEPARTMENT,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATION = #{STATION,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINGERPRINT = #{FINGERPRINT,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGINUSR = #{LOGINUSR,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGINPWD = #{LOGINPWD,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RIGHTLEVEL = #{RIGHTLEVEL,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{REMARK,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
